description: Enterprise techniques used by Ruler, ATT&CK software S0358 v1.1
name: Ruler (S0358)

techniques.comment: Ruler can be used to enumerate Exchange users and dump the GAL.[1]
Ruler can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Home Pages to establish persistence.[1]
Ruler can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Rules to establish persistence.[1]
Ruler can be used to automate the abuse of Outlook Forms to establish persistence.[1]
